text: Hi, is there a way to change multiple attributes without typing `plotobject.attribute` for every attribute you want to change?

elements.text: Hi, is there a way to change multiple attributes without typing
for every attribute you want to change?

text: Do you mean instead of passing them directly at creation as keyword arguments?

elements.text: Do you mean instead of passing them directly at creation as keyword arguments?

text: I am doing plotobject.color = "blue", plotobject.alpha = 0.5, etc. after fig, ax, plotobject = lines(...).  Is there a more efficient way?

elements.text: I am doing plotobject.color = "blue", plotobject.alpha = 0.5, etc. after fig, ax, plotobject = lines(...).  Is there a more efficient way?
